parties: Abdul Raheem Mohamed Mudassir & 7 Others Vs. Mohamed Munawwar Mohamed Mushtaf &  4 Others

keywords: Wakfs Board is a “Court of First Instance”,  Appointment of trustees to a mosque,  injunctions under Article 143 of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
